name: D.Watson Pharmacy E-Commerce
description: Modern e-commerce platform for D.Watson Pharmacy with admin dashboard, product management, and Cloudinary media uploads

PORT.description: Port number for the server (Heroku sets this automatically)

MONGODB_URI.description: MongoDB connection string. Get from MongoDB Atlas or use mongolab addon

LIVE_MONGODB_URI.description: Optional: Live/Main database URI for syncing data between databases

JWT_SECRET.description: Secret key for JWT token generation. Use a strong random string (min 32 characters)

ADMIN_PASSWORD.description: Admin user password (change this in production!)

CLOUDINARY_CLOUD_NAME.description: Cloudinary cloud name. Get from https://cloudinary.com/console

CLOUDINARY_API_KEY.description: Cloudinary API key. Get from https://cloudinary.com/console

CLOUDINARY_API_SECRET.description: Cloudinary API secret. Get from https://cloudinary.com/console

SENDGRID_API_KEY.description: Optional: SendGrid API key for email delivery (recommended)

SMTP_HOST.description: Optional: SMTP host for email (e.g., smtp.gmail.com)

SMTP_SECURE.description: Optional: Use secure SMTP connection (true for port 465, false for others)

SMTP_PASS.description: Optional: SMTP password or app password

EMAIL_USER.description: Optional: Fallback email user for Gmail (requires App Password)

EMAIL_PASS.description: Optional: Fallback email password/app password for Gmail

scripts.postdeploy: echo 'Deployment successful! Please configure your environment variables in Heroku dashboard.'
